source.cac37ee4:
from sklearn.manifold import TSNE
X_embedded = TSNE(n_components=2).fit_transform(X)
X_embedded.shape
df_subset = pd.DataFrame()
df_subset['tsne-2d-one'] = X_embedded[:,0]
df_subset['tsne-2d-two'] = X_embedded[:,1]
source.146161a9:
plt.figure(figsize=(16,10))
sns.scatterplot(
    x="tsne-2d-one", y="tsne-2d-two",
    palette=sns.color_palette("hls", 10),
    data=df_subset,
    legend="full",
    alpha=0.3
)
source.db7e49c1:
from sklearn.metrics import mean_squared_error as mse
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split
source.88db0e92:
df_s = df.head(500)
df_s = df_s.replace([np.inf, -np.inf], np.nan)
df_s = df_s.dropna()
X = df_s.drop(columns='prime')
y = df_s.prime
X_train, X_test, y_train, y_test = train_test_split(X, y, test_size=0.33, random_state=42)
source.b9d89adb:
from sklearn.svm import SVC
svm = SVC()
svm.fit(X_train,y_train)
y_pred = svm.predict(X_test)
print('Root Mean Square Error is ',np.sqrt(mse(y_test,y_pred)))
source.e3db5d1f:
from sklearn.linear_model import LinearRegression
lr = LinearRegression().fit(X_train,y_train)
y_pred = lr.predict(X_test)
print('RMSE ',np.sqrt(mse(y_test,y_pred)))
source.284abd1d:

X = df_s.drop(columns='prime')
y = df_s.prime
X_train, X_test, y_train, y_test = train_test_split(X, y, test_size=0.33, random_state=42)

import lightgbm as gbm

lgb = gbm.LGBMRegressor()
lgb.fit(X_train,y_train)
